pepper.framework.util module¶

class pepper.framework.util.Mailbox[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods

get([block]) Get Mail from Mailbox
put(mail) Put new Mail in Mailbox
EPSILSON = 1e-05¶
get(block=True)[source]¶

Get Mail from Mailbox

Parameters:
block: bool

If True: Wait for Mail until it arrives in Mailbox If False: Return Empty Exception when Mailbox is Empty
Returns:
mail: Any
put(mail)[source]¶

Put new Mail in Mailbox

Parameters:
mail: Any
